text: The match between Uruguay and Brazil was the game of the final stage at the 1950 FIFA World Cup. It was played at the Maracanã Stadium in the then-capital of Brazil, Rio de Janeiro, on 16 July 1950. ==Background== Team 2 2 0 0 13 2 4 2 1 1 0 5 4 3 2 0 1 1 3 8 1 2 0 0 2 3 10 0 ==Match== GK 1 Roque Máspoli RB 2 Matías González LB 3 Eusebio Tejera RH 4 Schubert Gambetta CH 5 Obdulio Varela (c) LH 6 Víctor Rodríguez Andrade OR 7 Alcides Ghiggia IR 8 Julio Pérez CF 9 Oscar Míguez IL 10 Juan Alberto Schiaffino OL 11 Rubén Morán Manager: Juan López Fontana |valign="top"| |valign="top" width="50%"| GK 1 Moacir Barbosa RB 2 Augusto (c) LB 3 Juvenal RH 4 Bauer CH 5 Danilo LH 6 Bigode OR 7 Friaça IR 8 Zizinho CF 9 Ademir IL 10 Jair OL 11 Chico Manager: Flávio Costa Assistant referees: Arthur Edward Ellis (England) George Mitchell (Scotland) |} Match rules *90 minutes *No substitutions permitted ==References== ==Other websites== * El Maracanazo y la leyenda- Como explicar lo inexplicable 1 1950
title: Uruguay v Brazil (1950 FIFA World Cup)
